IEE single format normalize range

Nmax = (2 - 2^-23) * 2^127 ≈ 2^128
Nmin = 2^-126
 
Nmin <= |x| <= Nmax

=========================================================================

1/10 = (0.000110011[0011]...) = (1.1[0011]...) x 2^-4

round(1/10)	IEEE single format			value
down		[0][01111011][10011001100110011001100]	(1.100110011001100110011) x 2^-4
up		[0][01111011][10011001100110011001101]	(1.10011001100110011001101) x 2^-4
toward zero	[0][01111011][10011001100110011001100]	(1.100110011001100110011) x 2^-4
to nearest	[0][01111011][10011001100110011001101]	(1.10011001100110011001101) x 2^-4

========================================================================

1 + 2^-25 = (1.0000000000000000000000001) x 2^0

round(1+2^-25)	IEEE single format			value
down		[0][01111111][00000000000000000000000]	(1.0) x 2^0
up		[0][01111111][00000000000000000000001]	(1.00000000000000000000001) x 2^0
toward zero	[0][01111111][00000000000000000000000]	(1.0) x 2^0
to nearest	[0][01111111][00000000000000000000000]	(1.0) x 2^0

========================================================================

2^130 = (1.0) x 2^130

round(2^130)	IEEE single format			value
down		[0][11111110][11111111111111111111111]	≈ (1.0) x 2^128
up		[0][11111111][00000000000000000000000]	∞
toward zero	[0][11111110][11111111111111111111111]	≈ (1.0) x 2^128
to nearest	[0][11111110][11111111111111111111111]	≈ (1.0) x 2^128
